title: Time + Space
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Time & Space par Turnstile
I know we’re gonna fall
When we’re walking right into a wall
So now we got to separate
If we ever want to find real change

We need time & space

Love is hard to find
And all my dreams got me outta my mind
But now I got to separate
For real goddamn change

I need time & space
